briefTitle: Inflammation-Induced CNS Glutamate During Breast Cancer Treatment
officialTitle: Inflammation-Induced CNS Glutamate During Breast Cancer Treatment
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female breast cancer patients will have undergone surgery (lumpectomy or mastectomy) with or without neoadjuvant or adjuvant chemotherapy
* Age between 21-65 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* Taking trastuzumab
